quote: I saved more than $600 million — I got involved in negotiations on a fighter jet. The F-35. And, by the way, Lockheed Martin: a great company, but they weren't bringing their price down. I got involved, I saved more than $600 million.
quotePlain: I saved more than $600 million — I got involved in negotiations on a fighter jet. The F-35. And, by the way, Lockheed Martin: a great company, but they weren’t bringing their price down. I got involved, I saved more than $600 million.
name: Donald Trump
where: interview with Fox News' Bill O'Reilly

claims.title: Trump saved hundreds of millions on F-35
claims.negative: Trump didn't save hundreds of millions on F-35
claims.negativePlain: Trump didn’t save hundreds of millions on F-35
claims.truth: Most of the cuts were already planned.
claims.truthPlain: Most of the cuts were already planned.
